## Libraries

```{r}
#| silent: true
#| message: false
library("tidyverse")
library("here")
library("dplyr")
source("99_proj_func.R")
```

Now that we have already imported the necessary libraries, we proceed to load the files and merge them

```{r}
#| silent: true

processed_data_path <- here("data")
if (!exists("female_metada")) {
  female_metada<-read_csv(file = here("data","02_female_metadata.csv"))
}
if (!exists("male_metadata")) {
  male_metadata<-read_csv(file = here("data", "02_male_metadata.csv"))
}
if (!exists("female_norm_counts")) {
female_norm_counts<-read_csv(file = here("data","02_norm_counts_filtered_female.csv"))
}
if (!exists("male_norm_counts")) {
male_norm_counts<-read_csv(file = here("data", "02_norm_counts_filtered_male.csv"))
}
if (!exists("counts_filtered_female")) {
  counts_filtered_female <- read_csv(file = here("data","02_counts_filtered_female.csv"))
}

if (!exists("counts_filtered_male")) {
  counts_filtered_male <- read_csv(file = here("data","02_counts_filtered_male.csv"))
}

```

## Age

```{r}
female_bp <- box_plot(female_metada,
         cancer_status,age_at_diag)
box_plot(male_metadata,
         cancer_status,age_at_diag)

ggsave(here("docs/image/", "03_female_age_tumor_boxplot.png"), 
       plot =female_bp, 
       width = 10, height = 6, dpi = 300,
       bg = "white")
```

## Country

```{r}
bar_country <- ggplot(data = female_metada,
       map = aes(
         x = country,
         fill = country
       )) +
  geom_bar()
ggsave(
  here("docs/image/", "03_female_country_distribution.png"), 
  plot =bar_country, 
  width = 10, 
  height = 6, 
  dpi = 300,
  bg = "white")

```

```{r}
ggplot(data = male_metadata,
```

## Cancer Types

```{r}
sample_histo <- ggplot(data = female_metada,
       map = aes(
         x = histol_type,
         fill = sample_type
       ))+
  geom_bar(position = "dodge") + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = 1, hjust=1))

  plot =sample_histo,
```

## RNA Expression Distribution

```{r}

rand_gene_expression <- counts_filtered_female |> 
  slice_sample(n = 1000) |> 
  pivot_longer(cols = -gene_id,
               names_to = "samples",
               values_to = "GeneCount")



wide <- ggplot(data = rand_gene_expression,
       map = aes(
         x = GeneCount,
         col = gene_id
       )) +
  geom_density() + 
  theme(legend.position = "None") +
  xlim(0,6000)

middle <-  ggplot(data = rand_gene_expression,
       map = aes(
         x = GeneCount,
         col = gene_id
       )) +
  geom_density() + 
  theme(legend.position = "None") +
  xlim(0,1000)

small <-  ggplot(data = rand_gene_expression,
       map = aes(
         x = GeneCount,
         col = gene_id
       )) +
  geom_density() + 
  theme(legend.position = "None") +
  xlim(0,100)



ggsave(
  here("docs/image/", "03_rna_distribution_wide.png"), 
  plot =wide, 
  width = 10, 
  height = 6, 
  dpi = 300,
  bg = "white")


ggsave(
  here("docs/image/", "03_rna_distribution_middle.png"), 
  plot =middle, 
  width = 10, 
  height = 6, 
  dpi = 300,
  bg = "white")
ggsave(
  here("docs/image/", "03_rna_distribution_close.png"), 
  plot =small, 
  width = 10, 
  height = 6, 
  dpi = 300,
  bg = "white")
```
